page.title: 08CHILTHORNE DOMER CHURCH
page.content: Chilthorne church is in the middle of Main church.The church of St.Mary the Virgin is about 700 years old.It has only 23 pews and a stone cross on the roof.The first rector in 1297 was called Henricus.The last rector was in 1982,Ronald Max Percy Brook.There are eight stained glass windows with pictures in the church ,and all the rest are plain.In the graveyard,there are around six tombs,and all the rest are crosses or stones.There is one lump of rock that has no writing on.There are 4 brass dedications to people.The choir has only 4 pews between all of them.There are no pictures in the church.One bell is on the ground because it is falling apart,and the village is having to raise money to get another one.
